title: Cody Simpson's mum Angie Simpson gives his new romance with Miley Cyrus her tick of approval
text:
Cody Simpson's mother Angie has finally weighed in on her son's new romance with pop star, Miley Cyrus.

The mother-of-three announced she couldn't be happier to see her son and his girlfriend happy and in love.

Taking to her Instagram, Angie shared a black and white snap of Cody and Miley.

'Seeing the smiles on your faces lights up my heart': Cody Simpson's mum Angie (left) gives his new romance with Miley Cyrus her tick of approval (Pictured with Cody in October 2017)

'It puts a smile on my dial to see you both so blissfully happy, Hearing your laughs and seeing the smiles on your faces lights up my heart,' she captioned the snap.

She then tagged the couple, along with the hashtags: #happyforyouguys and #beautifullsouls.

Quick to respond to her post, Miley put a series of black hearts under the post.

'It puts a smile on my dial to see you both so blissfully happy,' Angie wrote alongside a black and white snap of Cody, 22, and his new girlfriend Miley, 26

Quick to respond to her post, Miley responded to the post with a series of black hearts

Cody's younger sister Alli has also given her blessing.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia at the Moet & Chandon Spring Champion Stakes Day on Saturday, she said: 'They're very happy and very in love.'

'It's very new, but they have history and they're posting about each other a lot,' commented the 21-year-old YouTuber.

New couple: Cody and Miley began dating after her split with reality star Kaitlynn Carter, who is the ex-partner of Brody Jenner

Angie is the doting mother of three.

She shares one daughter, Alli, 21, and two sons, Cody, 22, and Tom 13, with her long-time husband Brad.

On Friday, Cody revealed that he was 'very, very happy' with his pop star girlfriend.

'She's very passionate about what she does, and I'm very similar in that sense. That's why we get along so well,' he said.

Cody and Miley began dating after her split with reality star Kaitlynn Carter, who is the ex-partner of Brody Jenner.

Before her fling with Kaitlynn, Miley was in a long-term relationship Liam Hemsworth, whom she married in December 2018.
description: Cody Simpson's mother Angie has finally weighed in on her son's new romance with pop star, Miley Cyrus.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
